detail_desc: Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Leather sandals with narrow leather straps that tie around the ankles, tiger-striped insoles and rubber soles.

Trainers with imitation leather and imitation suede details, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

PREMIUM QUALITY. Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with peak lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, patch pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest which, combined with a gently shaped waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Hat in braided paper straw with a contrasting colour grosgrain band. Width of brim 3 cm.
5-pocket jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.

Chinos in a stretch cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Decorative coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and fake jetted back pockets.

Set with an all-in-one suit and hat in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved all-in-one suit with a print motif, press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbing around the neckline and hems. Hat with a padded pompom on top and ribbed hem.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Trainers in patterned cotton canvas with sequins, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Shirt woven in a patterned cotton and viscose blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in a textured premium cotton weave with contrasting colour details on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Cutaway collar, French front, yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Metal rings in various designs. Three of the rings are smooth.
Metal rings in various designs. Three of the rings are smooth.
Multi-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs. One chain decorated with plastic beads and one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 40-47 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Shirt in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Fabric belt with an adjustable metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, a welt back pocket and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Two-button jacket in a herringbone linen and cotton weave with a decorative chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined.
Shorts in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative drawstring. Zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Shorts in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative drawstring. Zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Shorts in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative drawstring. Zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Short, straight-cut dungaree dress in jacquard-patterned jersey with a chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and buttons at the sides. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in a fine-knit linen and cotton blend with shoulder straps, a double row of flounces at the top, buttons at the back and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a yoke at the back.
